Parameters: String: a String naming the invalid class.
String: a String describing the reason for the exception.
String: String describing the reason for the exception.
InvalidClassException(java.lang.String).Description: Report an InvalidClassException for the reason specified.

Returns: the detail message string of this Throwable instance (which may be null).
getMessage().Description: Produce the message and include the classname, if present.

ClassDesc: Thrown when the Serialization runtime detects one of the following problems with a Class. The serial version of the class does not match that of the class descriptor read from the stream The class contains unknown datatypes The class does not have an accessible no-arg constructor
